articles.title: 5 things at stake during the Patriots’ Super Bowl rematch with the Seahawks
articles.description:
Elite company for Drake Maye, a slice of history for Mike Vrabel, and several record-setting opportunities are on the table.

The post 5 things at stake during the Patriots’ Super Bowl rematch with the Seahawks appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots face Seahawks in Super Bowl LX on February 12, 2026.
Drake Maye aims for elite status with a potential record-setting performance.
Mike Vrabel could achieve historic coaching milestones impacting Boston's sports legacy.
